sourcesContent:
<template>
  <d2-container>
    <template slot="header">带状态表格</template>
    <d2-crud
      :columns="columns"
      :data="data"
      :options="options"/>
    <el-card shadow="never" class="d2-mb">
      <d2-markdown :source="doc"/>
    </el-card>
    <el-card shadow="never" class="d2-mb">
      <d2-highlight :code="code"/>
    </el-card>
    <d2-link-btn
      slot="footer"
      title="文档"
      link="https://d2.pub/zh/doc/d2-crud-v2"/>
  </d2-container>
</template>

<script>
import '../install'
import doc from './doc.md'
import code from './code.js'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      doc,
      code,
      columns: [
        {
          title: '日期',
          key: 'date',
          width: '180'
        },
        {
          title: '姓名',
          key: 'name',
          width: '180'
        },
        {
          title: '地址',
          key: 'address'
        }
      ],
      data: [
        {
          date: '2016-05-02',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1518 弄'
        },
        {
          date: '2016-05-04',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1517 弄'
        },
        {
          date: '2016-05-01',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1519 弄'
        },
        {
          date: '2016-05-03',
          name: '王小虎',
          address: '上海市普陀区金沙江路 1516 弄'
        }
      ],
      options: {
        rowClassName ({ row, rowIndex }) {
          if (rowIndex === 1) {
            return 'warning-row'
          } else if (rowIndex === 3) {
            return 'success-row'
          }
          return ''
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
.el-table .warning-row {
  background: oldlace;
}

.el-table .success-row {
  background: #f0f9eb;
}
</style>
